p: A wide definition of influenza-related disease has been adopted, by including all studies where the target condition was labelled as laboratory confirmed influenza, influenza like illness (ILI); Parainfluenza Virus (PIV), acute respiratory infection (ARI), or respiratory syncytial virus (RSV). Conversely, studies estimating the costs of pandemic influenza, such as the 2009 swine flu pandemic, were not included in the review.
